meanings.sent1: Her sternutation interrupted the quiet library.
meanings.sent2: A sternutation can spread germs quickly.
meanings.sent3: During the funny movie, his sternutation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sternutation of the old car echoed through the garage.
meanings.sent5: The sternutation was so forceful, it startled the cat.

meanings.sent1: After her sternutation, she felt relieved.
meanings.sent2: His loud sternutation surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The sternutation during the concert added an unexpected sound.
meanings.sent4: The sternutation of the tea kettle sounded like a tiny explosion.
meanings.sent5: The sudden sternutation caught her by surprise.
